episode_event_ch0122_ch0123_special/4001:
That battle was worthy of being number one
on Pasio...

Maybe even number one in the world!
But next time, I’ll win. You’ll see!

Do you wonder what lies beyond the
Elite Four?

Go. See with your own eyes what
awaits you.
episode_event_ch0122_ch0123_special/4002: I’m so happy that we get to battle you here!

The trials that you and your Pokémon faced
so far...

I’m sure the strong bond that helped you
overcome them will be reflected in your
moves, too!

We hope to see your amazing moves that
shine as bright as the sun and moon!

The sun or the moon... Which do you prefer,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?

Soaking up the sun makes you feel
energized, doesn’t it?

Don’t you just feel so calm when you
spot the moon shining in the night sky?

We’ll show our respect for Alola’s Legendary
Pokémon and honor them.

And right up here in this spot on Pasio,
as close as we could get to the sun
and moon...

let’s have a battle worthy of this moment
and challenge one another with our ultimate
moves!
